Posts.Content: i had full strength first treatment and hair thinned so badly i shaved it. other than that treatment is very very tolerable and my treatment is working for my liver metastasis i am still working part time and go after my infusion i go wednesday and usually sat is my tired day after the first treatment it was reduced 20% and my hair is growing back and my blood work has been good i’m on my 5th cycle hope this helps
Posts.Title: Halaven experiences

Posts.Content: which union are you with and why would they ever have any access to your schedule.. something is not adding up i’ve been a union chairperson for 35 years and would never even suggest someone go back to work

Posts.Title: Life on Taxol

Posts.Content: your union CANNOT demand you work anything it’s not their business is it your local shop steward telling you this ? which union are you with ? i would be calling your president and tell them you’re being harassed. are you in canada ?
